org.apache.juneau.http.header

Class BasicStringHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.http.BasicHeader
      • org.apache.juneau.http.header.BasicStringHeader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Header, NameValuePair
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AcceptRanges, Authorization, BasicMediaRangeArrayHeader, BasicMediaTypeHeader, CacheControl, ClientVersion, Connection, ContentEncoding, ContentRange, Expect, Forwarded, From, Host, NoTrace, Origin, Pragma, ProxyAuthenticate, ProxyAuthorization, Range, Server, Trailer, TransferEncoding, UserAgent, Vary, Warning, WwwAuthenticate

    public class BasicStringHeader
extends BasicHeader
    Category of headers that consist of a single string value.

    Example

    Host: www.myhost.com:8080

    • Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

                                   Object value)
        Convenience creator.
        Parameters:
        name - The header name.
        value - The header value.
        Can be any of the following:

      • of

        public static BasicStringHeader of(String name,
                                   Supplier<?> value)
        Convenience creator using supplier.

        Header value is re-evaluated on each call to getValue().

        Parameters:
        name - The header name.
        value - The header value supplier.
        Can be any of the following:
        • String
        • Anything else - Converted to String then parsed.
        Returns:
        A new BasicStringHeader object, or null if the name or value is null.

      • assertString

        public FluentStringAssertion<BasicStringHeader> assertString()
        Provides the ability to perform fluent-style assertions on this header.
        Examples:

        // Validates the content type header is provided. client .get(URL) .run() .getStringHeader("Content-Type").assertThat().exists();

        Returns:
        A new fluent assertion object.
        Throws:
        AssertionError - If assertion failed.
